mapper.select: select a.*,g.name goodsName,t.name typeName,u.username userName, u.mobile userMobile,d.name deptName from xz_user_goods_apply a join xz_goods g join xz_type t join sys_users u join sys_depts d on a.goodsId=g.id and g.typeId=t.id and a.userId=u.id and u.deptId=d.id where a.status=0 and a.userId=#{id}

select a.*,g.name goodsName,t.name typeName,u.username userName, u.mobile userMobile,d.name deptName,c.username checkName,c.mobile checkMobile from xz_user_goods_apply a join xz_goods g join xz_type t join sys_users u join sys_depts d join sys_users c on a.goodsId=g.id and g.typeId=t.id and a.userId=u.id and u.deptId=d.id and a.checkId=c.id where (a.status=1 or a.status=-1) and a.userId=#{id}
